p: The other two families with different distribution between the ROO and EVOO groups are Erysipelotrichaceae and Sutterellaceae where, in opposition to the other cases, the EVOO group shows the highest values ( Figure 3). The first family correlates inversely with insulin and the second one, inversely with leptin ( Table 3), although the main significant genus detected in this family also correlates inversely with insulin ( Table 4). The link of the EVOO group with bacterial percentages correlating with low levels of insulin was a recurrent result also in our previous report [ 12] and, therefore, polyphenols are good candidates to play a role in this outcome.
